snippet: An intensified campaign with foreign leaders and diplomats this week will press the case that there is no better hope to prevent further chaos.
abstract: Israel plans to intensify its diplomatic campaign urging Europe and United States to support military-backed government in Egypt despite its deadly crackdown on Islamist protesters; believes there is no better hope to prevent further chaos.
lead_paragraph: An intensified campaign with foreign leaders and diplomats this week will press the case that there is no better hope to prevent further chaos.

headline.main: Israel Escalating Efforts to Shape Allies’ Strategy
headline.print_headline: Israel Escalating Efforts To Shape Allies’ Strategy
